      • getLayout

        public Layout getLayout​(int configNumber)
        layout configuration ffrom the manual are: -0 == small "good for 4 or 5 players" -1 == big one drawn on 2 whole pages -2 == small "good for every number of players" -3 == small "good for 3 or 4 players
        Parameters:
        configNumber - configuration code
        Returns:
        layout with given config number
